description: Experience the calm waters of Aasee with a stand-up paddleboard for a 60-minute solo session.

locationInfo.description: Aasee is a peaceful lake in Münster, ideal for solo paddleboarding, with a fantastic view of the surrounding park.
safetyTips: Wear a life vest for safety.
Make sure you have a solid stance before paddling.

description: Take a leisurely 75-minute cycle around Münster's Promenade, a beautiful green space encircling the city center.

locationInfo.description: The Promenade is a loop around the city center, perfect for cycling with views of green parks and historic buildings.
safetyTips: Make sure your bike's tires are properly inflated.

activity: Photography Walk at the Botanical Garden
description: Spend 90 minutes capturing the stunning flora and fauna at Münster's Botanical Garden.

locationInfo.description: The Botanical Garden is a peaceful place for a photography walk, with over 7,000 species of plants to capture in a beautiful setting.
safetyTips: Respect the plants and stay on designated paths.

activity: Walking and People Watching at Prinzipalmarkt
description: Enjoy a 60-minute stroll and people watching at the heart of Münster, the bustling Prinzipalmarkt.

locationInfo.description: Prinzipalmarkt is Münster's iconic marketplace, lined with historical buildings, perfect for observing local life.
safetyTips: Stay mindful of traffic when crossing streets.
Be cautious of your belongings in crowded areas.

activity: Picnic at the University of Münster's Schlossgarten
description: Relax with a 90-minute solo picnic in the Schlossgarten of the University of Münster, surrounded by beautiful gardens.

locationInfo.description: Schlossgarten, the gardens of the University of Münster, provide a serene atmosphere for a solo picnic with views of the university's historic castle.
safetyTips: Bring sunscreen and a hat for sun protection.
